meanings.definition: The activity or occupation of making dresses.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed learning dressmakings in her sewing class.
meanings.sent2: Her dressmakings were displayed at the fashion show.
meanings.sent3: The dressmakings class was sew much fun!
meanings.sent4: Her dressmakings were like colorful threads weaving a beautiful tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The art of dressmakings requires patience and skill.

meanings.definition: The products or creations resulting from making dresses.
meanings.sent1: The boutique showcased various dressmakings from local designers.
meanings.sent2: Her dressmakings were elegant and well-crafted.
meanings.sent3: The dressmakings on display caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent4: Her dressmakings were a reflection of her creativity and style.
meanings.sent5: The dressmakings in the store window sparkled under the lights.
